it's accelerating the pace of life it's

and all this new technology was

to get a better idea of some of these

wanted to ask what really is going on
with Google is it making us smart is it
making us stupid so we raised a bit of

there and we devised an experiment to
try to understand how search is

to recruit people who had never searched

Savvy mostly women well educated as far
as we could tell the only way the groups

used an MRI scanner and those of you who
have been in the narrow tube know it's

we used these special goggles to show

then we had these simulated internet

memory verbal areas not too surprising

there was more than two-fold increased

The Experiment we took the internet
naive people and we trained them we said
for an hour a day we want you to search
online and we found there were
significant increases in brain activity
in the front part of the brain the

think's happening in these kinds of

presented with an unusual task we don't

neurocircuitry activation but once the

in activity representing brain
efficiency so what we're seeing today is
a a big booming business of brain

with our computer science department
because we think we can do it and we

so that we can improve brain efficiency
and brain health as we age in fact we've
done experiments where we put people on
healthy lifestyle programs including
brain training memory training physical
training and we find that it does
activate certain parts of the brain that
are important for memory so what about
this question is technology weakening
our memory if you ask people how many
phone numbers they remember today it's
probably a lot fewer than before and so
there's this concern that somehow the
PDA is shrinking your hippocampus and my
answer to that is we need to pick and

you want to use memory techniques but
for pretty much everything else you can
look that
up we also have to remember that just

Psychotherapy or anything else can alter

and teach older people how to use the

just wanted to comment on the future
brain because we're looking forward in
